WITH MAIN_SEARCH_LIST AS ( SELECT POLICY_ID AS MAIN_ID , TITLE , HITS , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE , '정책제안' AS BOARD_NAME , 'C00002' AS BORAD_ID , '정책제안' AS PDS_TYPE FROM POLICY WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
UNION ALL
SELECT NOTICE_ID AS MAIN_ID , TITLE , HITS , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE , '공지사항' AS BOARD_NAME , 'C00001' AS BORAD_ID , '공지사항' AS PDS_TYPE FROM NOTICE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
UNION ALL
SELECT PDS_ID AS MAIN_ID , TITLE , HITS , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE , '자료실' AS BOARD_NAME , 'C00003' AS BORAD_ID , PDS_TYPE FROM PDS WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
)
SELECT * FROM MAIN_SEARCH_LIST
